import _ from"./EmployeeAdvanceItem-7_uGZBS6.js";import{f as o,j as t,k as l,F as f,I as y,A as m,n as a,l as n,q as v,y as x,t as k}from"./frappe-ui-C71hWP7q.js";import"./ListItem-DFSd-WXY.js";import"./EmployeeAvatar-BSuwc1cA.js";import"./index-DVMUZnKy.js";import"./EmployeeAdvanceIcon-BQIxSIJj.js";import"./formatters-CZQ3OL1A.js";const w={key:0,class:"flex flex-col bg-white rounded mt-5 overflow-auto"},b={class:"flex flex-col bg-white w-full py-5 px-3.5 mt-0 border-none"},N={__name:"EmployeeAdvanceBalance",props:{items:{type:Array}},setup(i){const s=i;return(p,h)=>{var c;const r=o("router-link"),d=o("Button"),u=o("EmptyState");return(c=s.items)!=null&&c.length?(t(),l("div",w,[(t(!0),l(f,null,y(s.items,e=>(t(),m(r,{key:e.name,to:{name:"EmployeeAdvanceDetailView",params:{id:e.name}},class:"flex flex-row p-3.5 items-center justify-between border-b cursor-pointer"},{default:a(()=>[n(_,{doc:e},null,8,["doc"])]),_:2},1032,["to"]))),128)),n(r,{to:{name:"EmployeeAdvanceFormView"}},{default:a(({navigate:e})=>[v("div",b,[n(d,{onClick:e,variant:"subtle",class:"py-5 text-base"},{default:a(()=>[x(k(p.__("Request an Advance")),1)]),_:2},1032,["onClick"])])]),_:1})])):(t(),m(u,{key:1,message:"You have no advances"}))}}};export{N as default};
